item.title: Ultimate MoparScape Login and Miner
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

When i made this script i only knew the basics. But now i know how to use Bitmaps and DTMs and a lot of other things too. I have not and will not update this script. I might though if i am bored.

P.S This script is for MoparScape downloadable version, only used Mouse Coordinates, so it is very bad.

item.title: Ultimate MoparScape Login and Miner
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

Just let the script do all the work. Do not move the mouse while in buisiness.
This is the Ultimate Log In for Mopar and Miner.

Please fill out your log in details on lines 4 - 5.

Please Enjoy:

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//                                                    //
//  Dudeofthed's Login Script for Mopar and Miner     //
//  This is probably the first and best log in script.//
//  To work, read instructions below.                 //
//                                                    //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
{
 Instructions:
              1. Open up Moparscape.
              2. DO NOT MOVE MOPARSCAPE OR RESIZE.
              3. Make sure you can see the 'Start Server' button.
              4. Run the script
              5. Let the Script do it's job, do not move the mouse at anytime
                 while script is in motion. After logging in it will wait 10
                 seconds then continue!
}

program AutoLogin;

const
  Username = 'yes' ;  // MS Username
  Password = 'yes' ;  // MS Password

procedure StartServer;
begin
  Wait(1000)
  MoveMouseSmooth(295, 358);
  Wait(1000)
  ClickMouse(295, 358, True);
end;

procedure EnterServer;
begin
  Wait(1000)
  MoveMouseSmooth(387, 374);
  Wait(1000)
  ClickMouse(387, 374, True);
end;

procedure EnterWorld;
begin
  Wait(1000)
  MoveMouseSmooth(465, 347);
  Wait(1000)
  ClickMouse(465, 347, True);
end;

procedure SetupInfo;
begin
  Wait(1000)
  SendKeys(Username + Chr(13));
  Wait(1000)
  SendKeys(Password + Chr(13));
end;

procedure LoginEnter;
begin
  Wait(1000)
  MoveMouseSmooth(262, 374);
  Wait(1000)
  ClickMouse(262, 374, True);
end;

procedure Pickup;
begin
  Wait(10000)
  SendKeys('::pickup 1275 1' + Chr(13));
  Wait(2000)
  MoveMouseSmooth(591, 275);
  Wait(1000)
  ClickMouse(591, 275, False);
  Wait(1000)
  MoveMouseSmooth(605, 302);
  ClickMouse(605, 302, True);
end;

procedure MineIron;
begin
  Wait(1000)
  MoveMouseSmooth(196, 196);
  ClickMouse(196, 196, True);
end;

procedure MineIron2;
begin
 Wait(3000)
  MoveMouseSmooth(249, 209);
 Wait(1000)
  ClickMouse(249, 209, True);
end;

begin
  StartServer;
  EnterServer;
  EnterWorld;
  SetupInfo;
  LoginEnter;
  Pickup;
  MineIron;
 repeat
  MineIron2;
 Until(False)
end.

Read full topic
